100 graphs
approximately 50/50 Cooperators/Defectors
average connectivity 4
size 2000
max 10000 generations

Removing top 5% and bottom 5%:

95% of results need < 5000 generations
Average of 1400 generations

Therefore we will utilize a cap of 1100 for the number of generation per simulation

Results: (number of generations until either #cooperators = 0 or #defactors = 0, ordered decreasing)
